root.name: NHL 2001
root.description: GlitchIn the PlayStation 2 version, if you shoot the puck at center ice skating towards the other team's zone, the puck would go over the goalie's head (since he was so far out) and result in a goal. The only way to stop this is if the user takes control of the goalie.Fun FactThe first NHL game for the PlayStation 2 and a launch title.SoundtrackCollective Soul "Heavy"Templar "Here We Go"Cover AthletesOwen Nolan of the San Jose Sharks, former 1st overall pick of the Quebec Nordiques was the cover athlete for the North American version.Jere Lehtinen of the Dallas Stars was the covered athlete for the European Version.
